did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Prattsburg and Italy Hill Circuit quarterly conference meeting minutes, 1851-1894.

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Minutes of the board of the Prattsburg and Italy Hill circuit which at various times also included classes at Wixom Hill, Harmonyville and Bardeen.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Minutes of the board of the Prattsburg and Italy Hill circuit which at various times also included classes at Wixom Hill, Harmonyville and Bardeen.
